name: NSMachBootstrapServer
desc: A port name server that takes and returns Mach port objects.

items.name: + sharedInstance
items.desc: Returns the shared instance of the bootstrap server.

items.name: - portForName:
items.desc: Looks up and returns the port registered under the specified name on the local host.

items.name: - portForName:host:
items.desc: Looks up and returns the port registered under the specified name.

items.name: - servicePortWithName:
items.desc: Looks up and returns the port for the vended service that is registered under the specified name.

items.name: - registerPort:name:
items.desc: Registers a port with a specified name.
